data.name: SWEET FANTASY!
data.detailed_description:
"SWEET FANTASY" is a puzzle game about making combinations of lots of candy. 100 colorful levels with cat girls, elves and others await you! Lots of different effects and nice music. Complete the game and get a hundred achievements!

"Sweet Fantasy" You can take a breather from challenging games, you will immerse yourself in a world of diverse, colorful candy and beautiful girls!
An amazing variety of new levels, a beautiful gallery and pleasant music await you here!
Collect multicolored candy will be more and more interesting with each new level! Enjoy an interesting game and beautiful wallpapers with girls at the same time! Many interesting levels with amazing graphics are waiting for you!

What you can find in this game:


  • Challenging and interesting levels at the same time.

  • Incredible graphics and candy animation.

  • Lots of cute girls wallpapers.

  • Incredible sound and visual lvl effects.

  • Many levels and each one is different

  • Relax and have a great time.

Artist: OwnAHole

data.short_description: SWEET FANTASY - is a match 3 puzzle game. 100 colorful levels with cat girls and elves as well as fantasy worlds are waiting for you! Fun and relaxing music awaits you. Complete the game, unlock all the girls wallpapers and get achievements on your Steam profile!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Thai, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Serise or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
